title: Advanced Survival RPG System
description: Craft your light-heavy system survival / rpg project with gameplaytags and Data Assets, granting designers the power to customize capabilities.
longDescription:
Embark on an epic SURVIVAL / RPG journey with this versatile asset! Craft your light-heavy system with gameplaytags and Data Assets, granting designers the power to customize capabilities. Monitor and adapt to health, energy, hunger, thirst, and more on your immersive HUD. Unleash your potential as stats like oxygen, mana, armor, fatigue, radiation, weight, and temperature interconnect, impacting your sprinting, jumping, and beyond. Immerse yourself in dynamic widgets, a fall system, and other survival RPG subsystems that breathe life into your gaming experience!


| VIDEO |

| DOCUMENTATION |


Read documentation before integration or just start as a standalone project and add your own code. Feel free to ask me any questions!
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Versatile, scalable statistic
  • Mapped widgets and flexible value listeners
  •  Dynamic effects (particle cascade, nigara, sound component, camera modifier with arguments)
  •  Limb mapping with its damage, and effects
  • Interaction system with dynamic widgets
  • Driven by single Data Asset that you can adjust for any type of game or prototyping
  • Nothing is on tick, heavily optimised
  • Single variable for effects that is driven by gameplay tags

Number of Blueprints: 28

Input: Enhanced Input

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Documentation: https://mega.nz/file/RQwEjB4B#mBVeii80Klq9iVbWrZBxBg5PqLMo1MRbKbpzwIvUXog

Video: https://youtu.be/G9_xbq1toTk


Important/Additional Notes: Read documentation before project mergin. Project is using gameplaytags and data assets and is driven by listeners, heavily optimised.
